BEGIN

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   clocked_proc : PROCESS (
      clk,
      rst_n
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      IF (rst_n = '0') THEN
         current_state <= init;
         csm_timer <= (OTHERS => '0');
         -- Default Reset Values
         gun_px_idx <= "00";
         module_select <= "00";
         victory_px_idx <= "00000";
         -- pragma synthesis_off
         hds_current <= 0;
         -- pragma synthesis_on
      ELSIF (clk'EVENT AND clk = '1') THEN
         current_state <= next_state;
         csm_timer <= csm_next_timer;
         -- pragma synthesis_off
         hds_current <= hds_next;
         hds_clock <= -1;
         hds_clock <= 0;
         -- pragma synthesis_on
         -- Registered output assignments

         frame_done <= frame_done_int;
         gun_px_idx <= gun_px_idx_int;
         module_select <= module_select_int;
         victory_px_idx <= victory_px_idx_int;
         write <= write_int;
         -- Default Assignment To Internals
         bypass <= '0';
         counter <= 0;

         -- Combined Actions
         CASE current_state IS
            WHEN alien =>
               IF (counter < 1) THEN
                  counter <= counter + 1;
               ELSIF (write_ready = '0') THEN
               ELSIF (write_ready = '1') THEN
                  counter <= 0;
               END IF;
            WHEN bullet =>
               IF (counter < 1) THEN
                  counter <= counter + 1;
               END IF;
            WHEN back_to_0 =>
               IF (counter < 1) THEN
                  counter <= counter + 1;
               END IF;
            WHEN OTHERS =>
               NULL;
         END CASE;
      END IF;
   END PROCESS clocked_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   output_proc : PROCESS (
      bypass,
      counter,
      current_state,
      defeated,
      write_ready
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   BEGIN
      -- Default Assignment
      enable_int <= '0';
      frame_done_int <= '0';
      gun_px_idx_int <= "UU";
      module_select_int <= "UU";
      victory_px_idx_int <= "00000";
      write_int <= '0';

      -- Combined Actions
      CASE current_state IS
         WHEN init =>
            IF (write_ready = '0') THEN
            ELSIF (write_ready = '1' AND defeated = '0') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "00";
               gun_px_idx_int <= "00";
            ELSIF (write_ready = '1' AND defeated = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00000";
            END IF;
         WHEN alien =>
            IF (counter < 1) THEN
               module_select_int <= "01";
               gun_px_idx_int <= "00";
               write_int <= '0';
            ELSIF (write_ready = '0') THEN
            ELSIF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "01";
               gun_px_idx_int <= "00";
            END IF;
         WHEN gun_00 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "01";
               gun_px_idx_int <= "01";
            END IF;
         WHEN gun_01 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "01";
               gun_px_idx_int <= "10";
            END IF;
         WHEN gun_10 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "01";
               gun_px_idx_int <= "11";
            END IF;
         WHEN gun_11 =>
            IF (write_ready = '0') THEN
            ELSIF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "10";
            END IF;
         WHEN w_done =>
            frame_done_int <= '0';
            enable_int <= '1';
         WHEN en =>
            IF (bypass = '0') THEN
               enable_int <= '0';
            END IF;
         WHEN bullet =>
            IF (counter < 1) THEN
               write_int <= '0';
            ELSIF (counter = 1) THEN
               frame_done_int <= '1';
            END IF;
         WHEN win_0 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00001";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_1 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00010";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_2 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00011";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_3 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00100";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_4 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00101";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_5 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00110";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_6 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00111";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_7 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01000";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_8 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01001";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_9 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01010";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_10 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01011";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_11 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01100";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_12 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01101";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_13 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01110";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_14 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "01111";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_15 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "10000";
            END IF;
         WHEN win_16 =>
            IF (write_ready = '1') THEN
               write_int <= '1';
               module_select_int <= "11";
               victory_px_idx_int <= "00000";
            END IF;
         WHEN back_to_0 =>
            IF (counter < 1) THEN
               write_int <= '0';
            ELSIF (counter = 1) THEN
               frame_done_int <= '1';
            END IF;
         WHEN OTHERS =>
            NULL;
      END CASE;
   END PROCESS output_proc;

   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   csm_wait_combo_proc: PROCESS (
      csm_timer,
      csm_to_delay
   )
   -----------------------------------------------------------------
   VARIABLE csm_temp_timeout : std_logic;
   BEGIN
      IF (unsigned(csm_timer) = 0) THEN
         csm_temp_timeout := '1';
      ELSE
         csm_temp_timeout := '0';
      END IF;

      IF (csm_to_delay = '1') THEN
         csm_next_timer <= "100110001001011001111111"; -- no cycles(10000000)-1=9999999
      ELSE
         IF (csm_temp_timeout = '1') THEN
            csm_next_timer <= (OTHERS=>'0');
         ELSE
            csm_next_timer <= unsigned(csm_timer) - '1';
         END IF;
      END IF;
      csm_timeout <= csm_temp_timeout;
   END PROCESS csm_wait_combo_proc;

END fsm;
